skill.name: zimage-skill
skill.description: Generate images using ModelScope Z-Image-Turbo API. Use when user asks to generate, create, or make images, pictures, or illustrations.
skill.summary: Generate AI images from text prompts using the ModelScope Z-Image-Turbo model. Simply describe what you want and receive a generated image.
skill.author: yizhiyanhua-ai

security_audit.summary: Legitimate image generation skill. Static scanner flagged standard API integration patterns (network calls, credential handling) and documentation code blocks. All findings are false positives - the skill makes intentional API calls to ModelScope and uses standard environment variable pattern for API authentication.

medium_findings.title: Documentation Code Blocks Flagged as Shell Commands
medium_findings.description: The static analyzer incorrectly flagged markdown code fences (backticks) in README.md, README_CN.md, and SKILL.md as shell command execution. These are markdown documentation syntax, not actual Ruby or shell code. No command execution occurs.
medium_findings.confidence_reasoning: Markdown code blocks using triple backticks are documentation formatting, not actual shell or Ruby execution. The generate.py file uses subprocess only for Python script invocation, not shell commands.

low_findings.title: Path References in Documentation
low_findings.description: Documentation references to ~/.claude/ paths were flagged as hidden file access. These are informational path references for user configuration, not actual filesystem operations.
low_findings.confidence_reasoning: These are documentation path examples showing where to install the skill. The skill only writes to user-specified output paths, not hidden directories.

content.value_statement: Users need AI-generated images but lack technical knowledge of image generation APIs. This skill provides a simple interface to the ModelScope Z-Image-Turbo model for creating images from natural language descriptions.
actual_capabilities: Generate images from text prompts using ModelScope Z-Image-Turbo API
Support Chinese and English prompt inputs
Save generated images to user-specified file paths
Handle API authentication via environment variable
Provide status updates during image generation process
limitations: Requires a valid ModelScope API key to function
Maximum wait time of 120 seconds per generation
Output limited to JPG and PNG formats
Depends on external ModelScope API availability

use_cases.title: Create Social Media Graphics
use_cases.description: Generate illustrations for social media posts, blog articles, or marketing materials by describing the desired visual concept.

use_cases.title: Design Quick Concept Art
use_cases.description: Create rough concept visualizations for design projects, game characters, or creative brainstorming sessions.

use_cases.title: Produce Personalized Avatars
use_cases.description: Generate custom avatar images based on descriptive prompts such as style, appearance, and mood.

prompt_templates.title: Simple Image Request
prompt_templates.scenario: Basic image generation with a straightforward description

prompt_templates.title: Detailed Art Description
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an image: [detailed description including style, mood, lighting, and composition]
prompt_templates.scenario: When you need specific artistic control over the output

prompt_templates.title: Style-Specific Generation
prompt_templates.scenario: Requesting images in specific artistic styles like Ghibli, cyberpunk, or oil painting

prompt_templates.title: Custom Output Path
prompt_templates.scenario: Specifying where to save the generated image

output_examples.output:
Image saved to: result_image.jpg

Done! The image has been saved to result_image.jpg

output_examples.input: Generate a cyberpunk city at night, save as cyberpunk.jpg
output_examples.output:
Task started: xxx
Image saved to: cyberpunk.jpg

Done! The image has been saved to cyberpunk.jpg

output_examples.input: Create a Ghibli-style forest with misty mountains
output_examples.output:
Image saved to: result_image.jpg

Done! The image has been saved to result_image.jpg

best_practices: Use detailed descriptions including style, lighting, and composition for better results
Add quality keywords like 'high definition', '4K', or 'cinematic' to improve output quality
Specify the art style explicitly (oil painting, anime, photography, etc.) for consistent aesthetics
anti_patterns: Do not use extremely long prompts with contradictory descriptions
Avoid requesting multiple unrelated objects in a single generation
Do not omit the API key - the skill requires MODELSCOPE_API_KEY to function

faq.question: How do I get a ModelScope API key?
faq.answer: Visit modelscope.cn, create an account, and generate a token at modelscope.cn/my/myaccesstoken. The key is free to obtain.

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer: The skill outputs JPG by default. You can specify PNG or other formats by using the appropriate file extension in the output path.

faq.question: Why does image generation fail with timeout?
faq.answer: Check your network connection, verify the API service is available, and ensure your prompt does not violate content guidelines.

faq.question: How can I improve image quality?
faq.answer: Add descriptive details, specify the art style, and include quality keywords like 'high definition', '4K', or 'cinematic lighting'.

faq.question: What languages are supported?
faq.answer: Both Chinese and English prompts are supported. The ModelScope API handles both languages effectively.

faq.question: Where are images saved by default?
faq.answer: Images save to result_image.jpg in the current directory unless you specify a custom path as the second argument.
